```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
nrow(campatt)
nrow(dhist)
mean(dhist$amount)
median(dhist$amount)
mean(as.integer(dhist$is_anonymous))
mean(dhist$nonprofit.)
```

```{r}
anonhist <- dhist %>% filter(is_anonymous == "TRUE")
mean(anonhist1$amount)
median(anonhist1$amount)
```


```{r}
campatt1 <- na.omit(campatt1) %>% mutate(endprog = (amtraised/goalamt)*100)
```

```{r}
ggplot(campatt1, aes(x = endprog)) + geom_histogram(aes(y=..density..), colour="black", fill="white") +
 geom_density(alpha=.2, fill="#FF6666") + xlim(0,150) 
```

```{r}
ggplot(dhist, aes(x = amount)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 5, color="steelblue", fill="white") + xlim(0,120) + ggtitle("Distribution of Amounts Donated")
ggsave("amtdist.png")
```

```{r}
ggplot(dhist, aes(x = amount)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 5, color="steelblue", fill="white") + xlim(0,120) + ggtitle("Distribution of Amounts Donated")
ggsave("amtdist.png")
```



```{r}
ggplot(dhist, aes(x = amount, color = as.factor(is_female)))  +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 5, alpha=0.5, fill = "white", position="identity") + xlim(0,150) 
```


```{r}
ggplot(dhist, aes(x = as.factor(is_anonymous), y = amount, color = as.factor(is_anonymous)))  +
  geom_boxplot() + ylim(0,150)
```

```{r}
ggplot(dhist, aes(x = month, y = amount, color = month))  +
  geom_boxplot() + ylim(0,150)
```
